product_name: Nite Ize Figure 9 Large Carabiner Rope Tightener - Single
long_description: The Carabiner Figure 9 large rope tightener keeps rope tight without knots- the carabiner conveniently clips to fixed points for easy connection. This device from Nite Ize secures a load with high rope tension but avoids the hassle of tying, adjusting and untying knots. Fits braided rope 0.13 in. (3mm) - 0.38 in. (9mm). Load limit: 150 pounds. Maximum gate width: 0.75 in. (19mm). Instructions laser-etched on sides. Not intended for climbing or load-bearing use.
short_description: The Carabiner Figure 9 large rope tightener keeps rope tight without knots- the carabiner conveniently clips to fixed points for easy connection.
